short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant financial insights by analyzing news and sentiment for the current stock symbol on your browsing site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Market Vibe, the cutting-edge Chrome extension that revolutionizes how investors gather stock insights. Tailored for busy investors, Market Vibe swiftly delivers real-time, AI-based sentiment analysis of trending news and social media, allowing investors to uncover market sentiments for investing opportunities. This dynamic tool focuses on extracting relevant stock data from popular financial websites, ensuring investors are always informed about the latest stock trends.

Real-Time Insights: Ahead of the Curve
Market Vibe delivers real-time stock information effortlessly. Seamlessly integrated into your browsing experience, it extracts relevant stock symbols from websites you visit. The extension identifies your stock of interest and pulls the most recent data.

Trending Headlines: Instant Updates
Stay informed with trending headlines from credible sources. Market Vibe aggregates top news, offering a quick overview of the stock market. Keep up with trends, breaking news, and pivotal events shaping stocks.

Sentiment Analysis: Uncover Market Mood
Deciphering market sentiment is vital for informed decisions. Market Vibe employs advanced sentiment analysis algorithms. Visualized sentiment scores for each news article quickly show if it's positive, negative, or neutral, helping you align your strategy with market sentiment.

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive Navigation
Market Vibe's intuitive interface seamlessly blends with your browser. A single click unveils a variety of presented insights. From news summaries to sentiment scores, it simplifies complex stock data.

Privacy at the Core: Your Data, Your Control
Your privacy is important to Market Vibe. Market Vibe extracts stock symbols exclusively from visited sites, respecting your data. No access to personal or financial information, preserving your browsing experience.
